zokyo.utils.data_format_conversions module

zokyo.utils.data_format_conversions.coco_std_2_coco_toyo(coco_ann_path, save_folder=None)[source]

Function convert given standard COCO annotation json file to Toyo COCO annotation json files. If save_folder is not given then output is saved in the same folder

zokyo.utils.data_format_conversions.coco_std_2_voc(coco_ann_path, save_folder=None, database=None)[source]

Function convert given standard COCO annotation json file to Pascal VOC annotation. If save_folder is not given then output is saved in the same folder

zokyo.utils.data_format_conversions.coco_toyo_2_coco_std(coco_toyo_ann_folder, save_folder=None)[source]

Function convert given Toyo COCO annotation json files to standard COCO annotation json file. If save_folder is not given then output is saved in the same folder

zokyo.utils.data_format_conversions.coco_toyo_2_voc(coco_toyo_ann_folder, save_folder=None, database=None)[source]

Function convert given Toyo COCO annotation json files to Pascal VOC annotation. If save_folder is not given then output is saved in the same folder

zokyo.utils.data_format_conversions.voc_2_coco_std(voc_folder_path, save_folder=None, info=None)[source]

Function convert given Pascal VOC annotations to standard COCO annotation json file. If save_folder is not given then output is saved in the same folder

zokyo.utils.data_format_conversions.voc_2_coco_toyo(voc_folder_path, save_folder=None, info=None)[source]

Function convert given Pascal VOC annotation to Toyo COCO annotation json files. If save_folder is not given then output is saved in the same folder
